Omnipresence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Omniscience.quote: Allah knows what is in every heart. (Quran 67:13)

Omnipotence.quote: With God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

Transcendence.quote: That which is Above is like that which is Below. (Hermes Trismegistus, Emerald Tablet)

Immanence.quote: Brahman is all, and the Self is Brahman. (Mandukya Upanishad)

Eternity.quote: Before Abraham was born, I am. (John 8:58)

Infinity.quote: The Infinite pervades all space and time. (Chandogya Upanishad 3.14.3)

Unity.quote: All is One and One is All. (Hermetic principle of correspondence)

Consciousness.quote: Pure consciousness is the fundamental nature of existence. (Yoga Sutras 1.2)

Love.quote: God is love, and whoever abides in love abides in God. (1 John 4:16)

Wisdom.quote: The Lord by wisdom founded the earth. (Proverbs 3:19)

Truth.quote: I am the way, the truth, and the life. (John 14:6)

Beauty.quote: Beauty emanates from the Divine source of all being. (Plotinus, Enneads)

Justice.quote: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of your throne. (Psalm 89:14)

Mercy.quote: Allah is the most Merciful of the merciful. (Quran 12:92)

Freedom.quote: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom. (2 Corinthians 3:17)

Creativity.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Bliss.quote: Ananda (divine bliss) is the nature of the Self. (Taittiriya Upanishad)

Peace.quote: The peace of God, which transcends all understanding. (Philippians 4:7)

Light.quote: God is light; in him there is no darkness at all. (1 John 1:5)

Life.quote: In Him was life, and that life was the light of all mankind. (John 1:4)

Perfection.quote: Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect. (Matthew 5:48)

Silence.quote: Be still, and know that I am God. (Psalm 46:10)

Harmony.quote: The Tao brings about harmony in the whole universe. (Tao Te Ching 42)
